backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing access control, user profiles, reviews, comments, and reading‑tracker data with CRUD and query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten map of frontend file paths to short human‑readable summaries.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_SMOKE_CHECK.md: Short deployment checklist for verifying app behavior before publishing.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining design‑token CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining core routes and layout with development route checks.
frontend/src/components/CopyAppLinkContr: UI control allowing users to copy the app link with clipboard fallback dialog.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Global layout with header navigation, mobile menu, login button, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: UI button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with error display and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerUserPro: Fetches the current user's profile using the backend actor, tracking loading and fetch state.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveCallerUse: Mutation hook to save the caller's user profile and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useComments.t: Loads comments for a given review ID via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useLatestRevi: Fetches a list of the latest reviews with an optional limit.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useReview.ts: Fetches a single review by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/reviews/useReviewMuta: Provides mutations for adding reviews, liking/unliking reviews, and adding comments with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/tracker/useReadingMet: Fetches authenticated user's reading metrics from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/tracker/useTrackedBoo: Fetches the authenticated user's tracked books list.
frontend/src/hooks/tracker/useTrackerMut: Mutations for adding, updating, removing tracked books and updating reading metrics with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor bound to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identity, and login status.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ReaderDashboardPage.t: Displays authenticated users’ reading stats and currently tracked books using metrics and tracked-books hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ReadingTrackerPage.ts: Provides an interface for authenticated users to add books, update progress and metrics, and manage their reading list.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single review with rating, likes, comments, and allows authenticated users to interact via likes and comments.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsFeedPage.tsx: Displays a feed of recent reviews and lets authenticated users submit new reviews through a form.
frontend/src/utils/appLink.ts: Utility functions that safely return the app’s origin or full URL when running in a browser.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into relative or short date strings for UI display.
frontend/src/utils/internetIdentityConfi: Builds Internet Identity config at runtime, selecting provider and derivation origin based on environment and hostname.
frontend/src/utils/referral.ts: Generates a UTM content value based on the current hostname with a safe fallback for non-browser contexts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including support for hash routing and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS setup with custom colors, container settings, animations, and theme extensions including plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, issues, and versioned state for a book review and reading tracker app.
